Monte Carlo Method for Standardized Indirect Effect in a Simple Mediation Model Assuming \(t\) Distribution for Data Generated from a Multivariate Normal Distribution

Source: R/mcstddelta.R
mvn_std_mctdelta.Rd

Monte Carlo Method for Standardized Indirect Effect in a Simple Mediation Model Assuming \(t\) Distribution for Data Generated from a Multivariate Normal Distribution

mvn_std_mctdelta(data, taskid, R = 5000)

Arguments

data

n by 3 matrix or data frame. data[, 1] correspond to values for x. data[, 2] correspond to values for m. data[, 3] correspond to values for y.
taskid

Numeric. Task ID.
R

Integer. Monte Carlo replications.

See also

Other monte carlo method functions: .mcmvn(), .mct(), mc(), mvn_mcmvn_mar_pcci_simulation(), mvn_mcmvn_mar_pcci_task(), mvn_mcmvn_mar_simulation(), mvn_mcmvn_mar_task(), mvn_mcmvn_mar(), mvn_mcmvn_mcar_pcci_simulation(), mvn_mcmvn_mcar_pcci_task(), mvn_mcmvn_mcar_simulation(), mvn_mcmvn_mcar_task(), mvn_mcmvn_mcar(), mvn_mcmvn_pcci_simulation(), mvn_mcmvn_pcci_task(), mvn_mcmvn_simulation(), mvn_mcmvn_task(), mvn_mcmvn(), mvn_mct_mar_pcci_simulation(), mvn_mct_mar_pcci_task(), mvn_mct_mar_simulation(), mvn_mct_mar_task(), mvn_mct_mar(), mvn_mct_mcar_pcci_simulation(), mvn_mct_mcar_pcci_task(), mvn_mct_mcar_simulation(), mvn_mct_mcar_task(), mvn_mct_mcar(), mvn_mct_pcci_simulation(), mvn_mct_pcci_task(), mvn_mct_simulation(), mvn_mct_task(), mvn_mct(), mvn_std_mcmvndelta_pcci_simulation(), mvn_std_mcmvndelta_pcci_task(), mvn_std_mcmvndelta_simulation(), mvn_std_mcmvndelta_task(), mvn_std_mcmvndelta(), mvn_std_mcmvnsem_pcci_simulation(), mvn_std_mcmvnsem_pcci_task(), mvn_std_mcmvnsem_simulation(), mvn_std_mcmvnsem_task(), mvn_std_mcmvnsem(), mvn_std_mcmvntb_pcci_simulation(), mvn_std_mcmvntb_pcci_task(), mvn_std_mcmvntb_simulation(), mvn_std_mcmvntb_task(), mvn_std_mcmvntb(), mvn_std_mctdelta_pcci_simulation(), mvn_std_mctdelta_pcci_task(), mvn_std_mctdelta_simulation(), mvn_std_mctdelta_task(), mvn_std_mctsem_pcci_simulation(), mvn_std_mctsem_pcci_task(), mvn_std_mctsem_simulation(), mvn_std_mctsem_task(), mvn_std_mctsem(), mvn_std_mcttb_pcci_simulation(), mvn_std_mcttb_pcci_task(), mvn_std_mcttb_simulation(), mvn_std_mcttb_task(), mvn_std_mcttb()

Examples

taskid <- 1
data <- mvn_dat(taskid = taskid)
mvn_std_mctdelta(data = data, taskid = taskid, R = 200)
